column5: Hey dude, how about "taking us along with you" on your adventure to photograph the grizzlies?  http://i72.photobucket.com/albums/i167/Brooky5/Brandon/Brandon4.jpg  If you log in and can upload some pics of your trip, please post em as you can.  Have fun and stay safe.
i thought at some point he had posted a link on facebook that you could add and follow.  dont know the link offhand though  ryan
If anyone has the link, please post it
the thread    its in his first post.  ryan
